synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Single crystals suitable for X-ray analysis were grown.

synthesis_conditions.method: heated at reflux for approximately 4 h
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: LnX3·6 H2O (0.026 mmol; Ln = Pr X = Br), 5LIO-Me-3,2-hopo (ca. 20 mg, 0.05 mmol), pyridine (20 mL)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: slow addition of diethyl ether induced precipitation
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Elemental analysis calcd (%) for H+[Pr(C18H20N4O7)2](cid:3)·2 H2O (986.71 g mol(cid:3)1): C 43.97, H, 5.04, N 11.26; found C 43.66, H 4.92, N 11.11.

synthesis_conditions.method: heated at reflux for approximately 4 h
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: LnX3·6 H2O (0.026 mmol; Ln = Ho X = Cl), 5LIO-Me-3,2-hopo (ca. 20 mg, 0.05 mmol), pyridine (20 mL)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: slow addition of diethyl ether induced precipitation
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Elemental analysis calcd (%) for H+[Ho(C18H20N4O7)2](cid:3)·5 H2O (1064.78 g mol(cid:3)1): C 40.61, H 4.83, N 10.52; found: C 40.14, H 4.65, N 10.25.
